seven.progpracticum

Class ToolBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JToolBar
            • seven.progpracticum.ToolBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class ToolBar
extends javax.swing.JToolBar
    The ToolBar class contains a toolbar of toggle buttons that allows them to change the color of the background.
    Version:
    Autumn 2013
    Author:
    Aaron Schraufnagel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Class Invariant:
    None
